"Punish the Forest Hooligan!":
"Have you heard, meow?
There's a really violent thing in the Forest
causing trouble for everyone!
If I can beat that thing I'm sure that my
popularity with the ladies will meowve way
up... Err, Uh, I mean!
For world peace, will you come and beat
that thing with me?
*Clear with an S Rank accompanied
only by Kuro"
